Your Personalized Recovery Plan

Right now you’re in the peak shedding stage, when hair fall feels most intense. An ongoing stress load is fueling this, and short, restless sleep is leaving your system little chance to reset. This plan focuses on anchoring your nights, calming the stress response, and strengthening nutrition so your body can shift from chaotic loss toward stabilization. Each small habit restores control and builds the foundation for steady regrowth. ✨

Start today—your next hair chapter begins with consistency.
